## Introduction
With the rising costs of living across the United States, [reports](https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/jul/29/us-economy-workers-paycheck-robert-reich)
show that citizens are living paycheck to paychek as a means of survivability. 



Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
